select Observation.*, SystemUser.username, SystemUser.name, Country.name as countryName, Paragraph.paragraphNumber as paragraphNumber from Paragraph, Observation, SystemUser, Country WHERE Paragraph.id = #id# AND Paragraph.id = Observation.paragraphId AND Observation.userId = SystemUser.id AND Observation.privateObservation = 1 AND SystemUser.countryId = Country.id AND Observation.DELETED = 0 order by Observation.creationDate, Country.name, Paragraph.paragraphNumber, SystemUser.name
